## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvice">InlineAdvice</a> that tracks changes post inlining.

For that reason, it only overrides the &quot;successful inlining&quot; extension points.

Definition at line 98 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-h">MLInlineAdvisor.h</a>.
